titleStmt.title: The countrey peoples felicity. Or, A brief description of pleasure. Shewing the ready way of sweet content ... To a dainty new tune, called The hay-makers mask.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Laurence Price by Wing (2nd ed.)
Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half-sheet contains: The second to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
